acceptance.title: Agreeing to the Terms
content: Hey there! This is the deal between you and 4th Whale Marketing Inc. (that’s us). By using TopChats.com—whether browsing, clicking, or signing up—you’re saying “yes” to these rules and our Privacy Policy (over at topchats.com/privacy). If that’s not your vibe, no worries—just close the tab.
You need to be 18+ and cool with adult content to hang out here. If not, this isn’t the place for you.

changes.title: We Might Tweak These Rules
content: We can update this anytime. Changes kick in as soon as we post them. Keep checking back—using the site means you’re cool with the latest version.
Big legal stuff (like court rules) won’t change retroactively unless we say so.

access.title: Using the Site
content: We can pause or change anything on the site without warning. If it’s down, we’re not liable.
You’re in charge of your internet and making sure anyone using your connection knows the rules.
Need to sign up? Give us real info. We follow our Privacy Policy with whatever you share.
Pick a username/password? Keep it secret. Tell us ASAP if something fishy happens. Log out from shared computers.
We can yank your account anytime if you break the rules.

intellectualProperty.title: Our Stuff Stays Ours
content: Everything on the site—text, pics, code—is ours or licensed to us. You can use it personally, but don’t copy, share, or sell it.
Allowed: temp cache, one printout for personal use, download our apps (under their rules).
Not allowed: rip off images, delete copyright notices, use for business.
Want to use something? Email privacy@topchats.com.
Break this? We’ll cut you off and you’ll delete what you took.

prohibitedUses.title: Play Nice
content: Only use the site legally and respectfully. No:
Breaking laws, hurting minors, spam, impersonating, or messing with the site (viruses, bots, overloads).
We’ll boot anyone who ruins the fun.
